thread.title: Seasoned Sales Leader Joins n2y Executive Team from Pearson; Ryan Fast Named Vice President Sales

author: cnbc.com
title: Seasoned Sales Leader Joins n2y Executive Team from Pearson; Ryan Fast Named Vice President Sales
text:
HURON, Ohio--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Adding to its growing team of executive talent, n2y® today announced that former Pearson VP of Sales, Ryan Fast, has joined its executive team as Vice President Sales. Mr. Fast brings a wealth of career experience to n2y, ensuring that its global sales operation will continue to exceed expectations.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180416006011/en/
Sales leader Ryan Fast joins special education company n2y's growing executive team. (Photo: Business Wire)
“n2y is committed to serving the entire special education market,” explained Chrissy Wostmann, n2y CEO. “As a leader, my focus is to drive above-market growth and the ability to generate scalable growth takes superior internal capabilities, such as sales. Hiring new talent that aligns with our values and culture are critical components. With Ryan Fast joining as our Vice President Sales, we have a seasoned executive that can expand our field operation, inside sales, and account management operations to new levels of success. His strong customer focus and pulse on the industry helps ensure that we can serve as many students as possible with our award-winning special education solutions.”
“I am thrilled to bring my experience from an industry leader like Pearson, to n2y as it continues to grow and serve an often-overlooked part of the education market,” said Ryan Fast. “With my experience in special education – as well as other educational areas – I am confident that I will play a key role on n2y’s successful executive team.”
Prior to joining n2y, Mr. Fast served as Director and Vice President of Sales at global education leader Pearson, building on a successful career in education sales. Mr. Fast will report directly to n2y SVP, Sales and Marketing.
About n2y
n2y® is changing the way special education is taught by enabling students with special needs access to the general education curriculum through its award-winning curriculum, Unique Learning System® and with News-2-You®, a weekly current events newspaper where students are engaged with current and relevant news. SymbolStix PRIME®, a symbol database and creation platform, and newly-launched, L3 Skills™ deliver resources specifically designed for learners outside the general education spectrum. With age-appropriate learning solutions, n2y is committed to impacting and advancing the lives of individuals with special needs. With n2y solutions, everyone can learn. For more information, visit n2y.com .
